hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: MEMORY_IMAGE_FILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Pat of the raw memory image.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REKALL_PROFILE
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify the profile of the memory image to analyse.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CASE_NAME
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Name of the case - used to build output paths.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: OUTPUT_LOCATION
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Location of the evidence processing output

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: REKALL_ARGS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Specify extra arguments to pass to volatility

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: if [[ ! -d $OUTPUT_LOCATION ]]; then mkdir $OUTPUT_LOCATION || true; fi ## 1 rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} pslist >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/pslist_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} psscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/psscan_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} pstree >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/pstree_output ## 2 rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} dlllist >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/dlllist_output #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} getsids >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/getsids_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} handles >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/handles_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} filescan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/filescan_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} mutantscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/mutantscan_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} svcscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/svcscan_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} cmdscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/cmdscan_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} consoles >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/consoles_output ## 3 (depending on profile...) #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} connscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/connscan_output; #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} sockets >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/sockets_output; #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} netscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/netscan_output; ## 4 ## Dumping commands seems to require a pid... #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} malfind --dump-dir ${OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/malfind_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} ldrmodules -v > ${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/ldrmodules_output ## 5 rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} psxview >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/psxview_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} modscan >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/modscan_output #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} apihooks >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/apihooks_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} ssdt >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/ssdt_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} driverirp >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/driverirp_output #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} idt >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/idt_output ## 6 #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} dlldump --dump-dir ${REKALL_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/dlldump_output #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} moddump --dump-dir ${REKALL_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/moddump_output #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} procdump --dump-dir ${REKALL_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/procdump_output #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} memdump --dump-dir ${REKALL_OUTPUT_LOCATION} >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/memdump_output ## 7 #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} hivelist >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/hivelist_output rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} userassist >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/userassist_output ## 8 #rekall ${REKALL_ARGS} timeliner --output=body >${OUTPUT_LOCATION}/timeliner_bodyfile_output
